transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji boliye mam.
Executive: Haan sir good afternoon Anju baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Kaun bol rahe hai aap Anju ji baat kar rahe hai.
Executive: Haan Anju baat kar rahi hu account manager aapke.
Executive: Haan ji haan boliye.
Customer: Mujhe thoda aap se baat karni thi sir aapka concern aaya hua hai na catalog ke regarding thoda baat karna chah rahi thi.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Abhi available hai aap baat kar payenge?
Executive: Main abhi thoda bahar hu mam aap mam ke phone pe kar sakte hai.
Customer: Ah.
Customer: Mam se baat thoda sa mere baat sun aap aap main aapko 6 baje baad call kar sakta hu.
Customer: 6 baje ke baad.
Customer: Sir actually jo aapke concern regarding discussion hai wo sab system hona ke liye jaruri hai.
Executive: To aap mam se baat kariye main actually driving mein hu.
Customer: Achha nice.
Customer: Haan. Fir pehle free nahi ho payenge kya?
Executive: Haan ho jaunga to kar dunga 5:00 5:30 tak, theek hai?
Customer: Haan haan bilkul ek baar 5:00 5:30 tak connect kar sakte hai, theek hai sir.
Executive: Haan main connect karta hu.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to discuss catalog related concern.

Resolution:

- Executive will connect by 5:00-5:30 PM.

Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect by 5:00-5:30 PM.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, concern, connect
